name: Car Mechanic Simulator: Racing
description:
Take on the role of a car mechanic who starts their first car workshop.

The game features a day and night cycle, which introduces a specific rhythm and requires organizing your work accordingly. By accepting more and more complicated orders, you can develop your skills. Along with the development, a number of additional possibilities open up to you. You can collect and tune up cars and take part in a number of complicated racing challenges.


Car Mechanic Simulator Racing features:

You can: take car repair orders, tune up your own cars, take part in racing challenges on several tracks, compete with other players for first place on the race leaderboards, expand your car collection and trade your cars.

Unlock over 25 unique skills. Some streamline the repair process, others increase earnings and some open up completely new game opportunities. The order of unlocking them depends only on you.

42 unique cars: classics, utility vehicles, muscle cars, sports cars, JDM cars.

1100 car parts. Those will enable you to construct complete: Chassis sets with drives (FWD, RWD, AWD), and engines (R4, R6, 3 Rotor, 4 Rotor, Boxer, V8).

Replace car paints, rims, spoilers, and wings.

Make progress in a number of racing challenges and compete against other players for a better place on the leaderboard.

Focus on trading cars and expanding your car collection.

Improve your repair skills and unlock advanced tuning (including engine swaps).

Increase workshop income, speed up work on orders, and compete for a place on the leaderboard of racing events.

Supported languages: English, Polish, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese ( Brazil), Russian.

Do you play car fixing, repair, mechanic, customizing games? Do you like simulator games? Car Mechanic Simulator Racing is the right game for you.

If you are looking for a great car restoration game, download Car Mechanic Simulator Racing now.
